short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate Alaska Airlines MileagePlan EQMs and CPM for flights on Alaska and all partner airlines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No need to open many tabs and whip out a calculator anymore! After looking for flights on your favorite flight search platform, enter in ticket information (origin airport, destination airport, marketing airline, and fare code) to calculate the Alaska EQMs that you earn, and the cost per EQM.

Supported for Alaska and all partner airlines.
